titleStmt.title: The floating island, or, A new discovery relating the strange adventure on a late voyage from Lambethana to Villa Franca, alias Ramallia, to the eastward of Terra del Templo, by three ships, viz. the Pay-naught, the Excuse, the Least-in-sight, under the conduct of Captain Robert Owe-much, describing the nature of the inhabitants, their religion, laws and customs / published by Franck Careless, one of the discoverers.
titleStmt.author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?

notesStmt.note: Pseudonyms of Richard Head: Franck Careless and Samuel Swiftnicks. Cf. BM.
Attributed to Richard Head. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
"Mimic voyage imaginaire, exploring London, low-life, taverns, prisons, etc."--Cambridge bibliography of English literature.
